title: Neelangaraiyil Lyrics Pulivaal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Neelangaraiyil 
Singer(s): Karthik, Shreya Ghosal
Music : N.R.Raghurathan
Movie: Pulivaal

Neelangaraiyil kaanaanguruvi 
thaanaa thavikkudhey.
Vaanam thirandhu vaiyyam kadandhu
parapom kaatriley.

Udambilirundhu usura mattum
uruvi uruvi edukkadhey.
Maasam maasam diesel vilaipola
aasa paasam yethaadhey.

Podava thuvaikkum thuraviyapola
muliyaa mulikkuren.
Pulivaal kudicha eliyappola
thaviyaa thavikkuren.

Neelangaraiyil kaanaanguruvi 
thaanaa thavikkudhey.
Vaanam thirandhu vaiyyam kadandhu
parapom kaatriley.

Pattaa potta thanga katti
pattaam poochi pota kutti
oththupogum kadhali yellaam
fifty fifty pondaati.

Kanni ponna oramgatti
kannakilli kanna katti
kadhal pannum ponna kutti
yetti nillu naan getti..

Kadhal erumbu oorum podhu
kallum kooda theyumey.
DHooram paarthu nindra penmai
thozhil vandhu saayumey

Nee thoda thoda uchcham thala kodhikkudhey
viral pada pada ullangal kulirudhu
ne sandakaari aagum podhu padharudhu
en mandakulla natchathiram sidharudhu.

Pulivaal kudicha eliyappola
thaviyaa thavikkuren.
Podava thuvaikkum thuraviyapola
muliyaa mulikkuren. ........(Neelangaraiyil)

Cellphone mozhi pesi pesi 
chinna ponna kedukkadhey.
noolaampada noolakatti
koyil thera illukkaadhey.

Vellakaran pogumpodhey
vetkam kooda poye poche
kaalam ippo high tech aaache
kaiyya vittu pogadhey.

Pengal konda aayaellaam fridge-il
vaitha aaple pola
aangal konda aasa ellaam
viyilil vaitha vennai pola

Nee vara vara vakkilukku padikkura
nee vadham vadham panni jeyikkura
nee muttaalunu nambavachi nadikkura
un mutta kannil rettamuyal thudikkura


Podava thuvaikkum thuraviyapola
muliyaa mulikkuren.
Pulivaal kudicha eliyappola
thaviyaa thavikkuren. ...(Neelangaraiyil )
